constituent: draw near, house, strange, large, St. Bernard, can, street, nail, spike, mouth
heisigStory: Let the idea of drawing near suggest something dangerous or eerie that one approaches with fear and trembling. Here we see a strange house - perhaps the haunted House of Usher that Edgar Allen Poe immortalized, or the enchanted Gingerbread House that lured Hansel and Gretel to draw near.
koohiiStory1: The strange house has a sign saying "DRAW NEAR" in its window, instead of a ´Beware´ sign. It must be a trick!
koohiiStory2: Imagine a horror movie set in a haunted mansion. The house is very strange. The characters draw near to one another for protection against the unknown.
myStory: lại gần. người lạ vào nhà
readingExamples: 寄せる (よ.せる), 寄る (よ.る)
words: to push aside, to advance on
to stop by, to drop in for a short visit
to order, to send away for
to lean against, to recline on, to lean on, to rely on
be one-sided, partial, prejudiced, biased, lean, be inclined
